attributes.action: Welcome to Norway! Martin Bjelland Konstali (Open House)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those whom can turn "It" off, can do so, and then they can enjoy a beautiful vacation in Noruega! :-), and stay here. If they bring the off button, I will off course push it right away. No problem at all! Enjoy! :-) Please turn the system off! Please turn "It" off. Best Regards Martin Bjelland Konstali 17.01.2010

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
